      • isSuspended

        public Baker.BakerBuilder isSuspended(boolean isSuspended)
        A flag indicating whether the account is currently suspended or not. The flag has a meaning from protocol version 8 onwards. In protocol version 8 it signals whether an account has been suspended and is not participating in the consensus algorithm. For protocol version < 8 the flag will always be set to false.
        Returns:
        this.
